subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
organizations: New York City Football Club (Soccer Team)
lead_paragraph: In the Champions League final, Xavi Hernández, the Catalan playmaker, and Andrea Pirlo, the Italian virtuoso, said goodbye.
snippet: In the Champions League final, Xavi Hernández, the Catalan playmaker, and Andrea Pirlo, the Italian virtuoso, said goodbye.
